parameters: line
\N<Yuia>...I'm home.
\N<Segi>Welcome back, Lord Yuia.
\N<Yuia>Phew...
\N<Segi>Is something the matter? You seem quite tired.

\N<Yuia>Yeah, I got a bit carried away with some intense physical
activity after work today.
\N<Segi>Eh?

\N<Yuia>I was asked to give some swordsmanship lessons to the town's
vigilantes. With the way things are in the world, they want
to be prepared for self-defense if necessary.
\N<Segi>Is that so... But please don't overdo it, okay?
\N<Yuia>Yeah, I'll take it easy. I plan to go to bed early tonight.

\N<Segi>Oh, um... Lord Yuia. I'm sorry to bother you when you're
tired, but...
\N<Yuia>Hmm?
\N<Segi>No, it's nothing... I'll take care of the dishes.
\N<Segi>Ugh...

\N<Yuia>What's wrong? Are you okay? If it's about cleaning up, I can
do it. You should rest early if you're tired too.
\N<Segi>No, it's just... maybe, that...
\N<Segi>Ugh...
\N<Yuia>Segi... could it be that you are...

\N<Segi>Yes... probably just as you think. It seems to have
happened.
\N<Yuia>Between you and me...
\N<Segi>...Lord Yuia?
\N<Yuia>Ha ha... hahaha...
\N<Segi>Lord Yuia... are you pleased?

\N<Yuia>Of course I am, how could I not be happy about this? What
else is there to be happy about?
\N<Segi>That's true... I'm glad.
\N<Yuia>What's the matter? Aren't you happy?

\N<Segi>Of course not, I am happy. It's certain. It's our baby,
isn't it, Lord Yuia?
\N<Yuia>Yeah, I'm happy too. And very excited.

\N<Yuia>So... we're going to have a child... haha, I thought I'd go
to bed early today, but that seems impossible now. My
emotions are running high, ahaha.
\N<Segi>...
I wonder if I managed to smile properly.

Holding up a hand mirror... and then checking my own face.
And so, I want to quickly fix the face that I will show to
my beloved.
I am... I am...

Lord Yuia... right now, I want to be a woman who believes
only in the words that are convenient for herself.

Hearing your kind words... that's enough for me, and I'll
let only those words resonate in my heart.

And... by being so, I believe that I can continue to walk
alongside you into the future.
info3a
A
